resources.string: The email or password is incorrect.
Do you want to sign out?
No internet connection. Please connect to wi-fi or mobile data.
To get started, the app needs to download the necessary data.
Data initialization has not finished. The app needs to complete data download.
Initial data download is in progress. Do you want to stop and exit the app?

During data synchronization, the mobile app downloads from the ET-LITS web application the data to be stored locally for repeated and offline use. Changes done on the mobile app are sent back to the ET-LITS web application for final validation and permanent storage. Until then, locally stored data is not officially recognized. Some data can be changed via the ET-LITS website. If this data is not refreshed on your device, then your changes that rely on it may be rejected during data sync. Locally stored changes may also get lost due to device damage or unexpected data storage issues. Data synchronization must be done as often as possible, immediately the internet connection is available.
Default establishment has been set to: %1$s
Invalid animal Id. Allowed format is: ET 0000000001
Invalid Age. Allowed range is 1 to 300 months.
Selected date should not be in future.
Date Move-Off must be after or same as Date Identification
Date Move-On must be on or after Date Move-Off.
At least one animal must be registered.
"Please tap on ‘Add Animal' to enter a new animal in the list or edit icon to change the animal details.\nTap on the 'Next' button or swipe left to continue your activities. "

You are in process to register animals on the holding ground.
For each animal an Move-Off from holding ground and a Move-On to establishment will be created.
Please enter the EID of the holding ground and the dates of tagging and movements.
EID = Establishment ID
Fields marked with * are mandatory
Tap on the 'Next' button or swipe left to continue your activities.

If the animals were treated with treatments at arrival on the establishment you can indicate the kind of treatment by tapping the respective checkbox.\nPlease note that the treatments indicated will be registered for each animal in the list of animals.\nTap on the \'Finish Registration\' button to complete the animals’ registration.

Tap on the \'Dead\' animal toggle if the animal was found dead during transport.\nTap on the \'Done\' button to complete current animal data entry and return to the animal registration form.\nTap on the \'Add Next Animal\' to complete the current animal data entry and open new Animal Details to continue registering the next animal.
Any changes entered will be lost. Are you sure you want to leave?

Ethiopian Livestock Identification and Traceability System (ET-LITS) is a mobile app designed to assist in animal identification, recording and movement processes on the field. The system is owned and managed by the Government of Ethiopia.

Features

	
Secured access and data exchange
	
Offline data entry
	
Customized forms
	
Data validation
	
GPS location tracking
	
Image and file attachments
	
Data syncing with ET-LITS web application
